ingredients.item: 400g mixed spring veg, sliced (such as asparagus, mange tout or courgette)
coriander leaves and sliced salad onions, to serve

instructions.step: Soak the rice noodles in just-boiled water for 10 minutes, then drain, rinse under cold water and set aside. Heat the oil in a wok and fry the garlic and ginger for 30 seconds, then add the vegetables, stir-frying for 2-3 minutes, until just cooked. Scoop everything out and set aside.

Add the prawns to the wok and stir-fry over a high heat until just cooked. Return the vegetables to the wok; add the soy sauce, vinegar, chilli sauce and noodles. Mix well and serve scattered with the coriander and salad onions, plus some chilli flakes, if liked.
